The Happiest of being together

SIENTA
$234,920

On an outing with friends or family,
it's the atmosphere inside the car
that matters.

650mm
1145mm
330mm
Dual Power Sliding Doors

Getting in and out of the Sienta is a piece of cake in even the tightest parking spots. The low ground clearance design allows you to easily hop in and out.

A real 7-seater with space to spare

The Sienta allows 7 adults to relax in style with ample legroom for all. That's the beauty of a real 7-seater.

Space maker
More storage by conveniently fold the backs of the third-row seats and hide them underneath the second-row.
